hero.title: Front End Developer
hero.description: I am Abdelrahman Ragab Abdelbaky, a software developer specializing in front-end web development. I graduated from the Faculty of Engineering at Zagazig University in 2024. I focus on delivering innovative and engaging solutions that enhance user experience. I am committed to developing cutting-edge projects that achieve excellence and keep up with the latest trends in technology.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Reach out to me for more details and stay updated with my latest projects.
contact.successMessage: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully. ðŸ‘Œ

1.title: Restaurant Landing Page
1.description: A responsive restaurant landing page built with React.
1.details: This project showcases a landing page for a restaurant with modern design and responsive features.

2.title: Quran App
2.description: A React application for displaying Quranic verses with audio playback and translation features.
2.details: This project provides a comprehensive interface for viewing Quranic verses, listening to audio recitations, and reading translations. It includes features for navigating through surahs and ayahs, as well as playing audio for each verse.

3.title: Restaurant Market
3.description: An e-commerce website for a restaurant and market, featuring product listings and cart functionalities.
3.details: This project is an e-commerce platform that combines restaurant and market functionalities. It allows users to browse products, add them to a cart, and view their selections. The design focuses on usability and a clean interface.

4.title: Game Hub Website
4.description: A website designed as a hub for various games, featuring a user-friendly interface for discovering and playing games.
4.details: This project provides a centralized platform for gamers to discover, explore, and play different games. It includes features like game listings, search functionality, and interactive elements to enhance user experience.

5.title: My Portfolio
5.description: A personal portfolio website showcasing the work and projects of Abdelrahman Ragab.
5.details: This portfolio website highlights personal projects, skills, and experiences. It includes sections for project showcases, a biography, contact information, and more, all designed to present Abdelrahman Ragab's professional profile effectively.

6.title: Web Developer Showcase
6.description: A showcase website designed to highlight web development skills and projects.
6.details: This project serves as a portfolio website to display various web development projects, skills, and technologies used. It aims to present a comprehensive view of web development expertise through interactive and engaging content.

7.title: Website Builder
7.description: A comprehensive website builder application developed as a graduation project, showcasing advanced web development techniques and functionalities.
7.details: This project provides a robust platform for building and customizing websites. It includes various features for creating and managing website sections, templates, and content, demonstrating a deep understanding of web development principles and technologies. The application supports switching between Arabic and English languages using 'i18next', enhancing accessibility and user experience for a diverse audience. It represents the culmination of skills acquired during academic studies.
